name: HendrixforJudge
0:
”Alexa, open judge hendrix and play”
”Alexa, open judge hendrix”
”Alexa, open judge hendrix and tell me about the campaign”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: judge hendrix
des:
La’Rae Hendrix has a broad range of successful legal and life experiences that give her the wisdom, fairness and temperament we need on our county court bench. Her background includes:
Prosecutor in the State Attorney’s Office
Senior Attorney, Children’s Legal Services (Florida)
Extensive private practice civil and family law
Successful law firm and small business owner
Community volunteer and leader
Wife of retired naval officer, mother and grandmother
La’Rae is known in the legal community as a fierce litigator, unafraid of making tough decisions in the most complex legal cases. As the owner of La’Rae H. Hendrix, P.A., she has litigated and resolved hundreds of cases over the years, building her reputation for being fair, firm and trusted.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
